title: Victor Malone - Horror Fiction (epub/pdf/kindle)

"Malone is a secret, a very well kept secret...and I kind of want him to stay that way!" - STEPHEN KING

Malone's three published works:--

Straw Houses (novel)
The Secret Purpose of Bones (short stories)
Reflections In Broken Eyes (very short stories)
